page.title: 15RELIGION-PORTPATRICK
page.content: Portpatrick has three religious establishments. {Portpatrick Parish Church}(Church of Scotland) has a membership of 320 plus sitting under the Rev.John Cordiner. Weekly services are held at 11.30am. (11.00am in Summer)while Sunday School and Bible Class meet over the school session.The{Kirk Session,}guided by the minister, cares for the spiritual life of the Congregation,while temporal matters are handled by the{ {Congrgational Board. } The Scottish Episcopal Church of{St. {Ninian's,}has a small congregation. Services are taken at 10.00am on Sundays by the Rev.E.Kerrin,incumbent of the Episcopal Church in Stranraer. Members of{The Gospel Hall}hold services on the Sabbath and certain weekdays.Summer missions are supported.
